title: Lancaster Spending: Year-by-Year Trends and What They Reveal
summary: Lancaster City Council's spending increased by £33.9M (302.7%) from 2021 to 2025.
author: Lancaster Council Transparency

title: Red Flags in Lancaster's Spending: What DOGE Analysis Found
summary: The total spend analysed across 4 financial years is £143.2M.
author: Lancaster Council Transparency

title: Inside Lancaster's Departments: Where Every Pound Goes
summary: The ENVIRONMENT AND PLACE department received £17.9M, accounting for 12.5% of the total spend.
author: Lancaster Council Transparency

title: Where Lancaster's Money Really Goes: Top Supplier Analysis 2026
summary: The top 5 suppliers to Lancaster City Council account for £25.2M, which is 17.6% of the total spend of £143.2M.
author: Lancaster Council Transparency
